availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Pinkney C. Maxwell (Webster Co., KY, resident )

body.p: Webster County, Kentucky, and Putnam County, Tennessee, resident. Tennessee native. Married to Celia Jane Maxwell. Father of Calvin Maxwell, Mary E. Maxwell, Lewis M. Maxwell, John W. Maxwell, Granville Maxwell, Russell Maxwell, Tabitha Artemisa Maxwell, and William Maxwell. Peddler in Jackson County, Tennessee, in 1850. Farmer in Putnam County in 1860. Resident of Webster County, Kentucky, in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Tennessee, Jackson County, District 12, p. 260B.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Tennessee, Putnam County, District 7, p. 46.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, District 4, p. 228A.
Tennessee Death Records, 1908-1958, Tennessee State Library and Archives, Nashville, TN, Putnam County Death Certificates, File #49-05870.
KYR-0001-004-0137.
